Anak Amien Rais Masuk Penjaringan PAN sebagai Calon Bupati Sleman
07 Nov 2019, 16:24 by Pribadi Wicaksono (Kontributor), Kukuh S. Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Yogyakarta-Partai Amanat Nasional (PAN) Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta mempersiapkan kadernya yang akan diusung dalam pilkada 2020 di Kabupaten Sleman, Bantul, dan Gunungkidul. Dari tiga kabupaten itu, yang sudah mulai gencar melakukan penjaringan calon adalah Kabupaten Sleman.
Ketua Dewan Pengurus Wilayah PAN DIY Nazaruddin mengatakan, dari laporan yang dia terima dari pengurus PAN Kabupaten Sleman, sudah ada tiga kader yang menyatakan bersedia maju ke pikada.
Mereka ialah anak Amien Rais, Ahmad Mumtaz Raiz; Sadar Narimo; dan Raudi Akmal. “Ya sementara tiga orang itu yang menyatakan bersedia untuk maju dalam pilkada 2020 Sleman,” ujar Nazaruddin, Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Ahmad Mumtaz Raiz merupakan putera ketiga Amien Rais. Dia sempat maju sebagai calon anggota DPR daerah pemilihan Jawa Tengah VI dalam pemilu 2019 lalu. Namun, Mumtaz belum seberuntung Ahmad Hanafi Rais, Hanum Rais dan Baihaqy Rais.
“Semuanya masih proses. Tahapannya sekarang baru tahap penjaringan kader di tingkat DPD. Nanti dimintakan rekomendasi ke DPW, kemudian nama-nama itu dibawa ke DPP PAN untuk mendapatkan SK (surat keputusan),” ujar Nazaruddin.
PAN DIY, kata dia, tak akan membuka pendaftaran calon kepala daerah dari unsur eksternal untuk menghadapi pilkada di tiga kabupaten DIY itu. “Kebijakan kami, kalau untuk suatu daerah sudah banyak kader yang terjaring atau berminat maju pilkada, kami fokus pada kader itu,” ujarnya.
Nazarudin berujar dalam pilkada tahun depan PAN fokus pada kadernya sendiri. “Jadi prosesnya bisa yang bersangkutan menyatakan kesiapannya untuk maju, atau diusulkan oleh jajaran partai,” ujarnya.
PRIBADI WICAKSONO
text:
Amien Rais' son enters Penjaringan PAN as a candidate for regent of Sleman
Nov 07 2019, 16:24 by Pribadi Wicaksono (Contributor), Kukuh S. Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Yogyakarta-The National Mandate Party (PAN) of the Special Region of Yogyakarta prepares its cadres to be carried out in the 2020 elections in Sleman, Bantul and Gunungkidul Regencies. Of the three districts, which has begun to aggressively select candidates is Sleman Regency.
Chairman of the Regional Board of PAN DIY Nazaruddin said, from the report he received from the management of the PAN of Sleman Regency, there were already three cadres who stated they were willing to go to Pikada.
They are Amien Rais's son, Ahmad Mumtaz Raiz; Sadar Narimo; and Raudi Akmal. "Yes, while the three people stated they were willing to go forward in the Sleman 2020 elections," Nazaruddin said, Thursday, November 7, 2019.
Ahmad Mumtaz Raiz is the third son of Amien Rais. He had advanced as a candidate for DPR member in the Central Java electoral district VI in the 2019 election. However, Mumtaz has not been as fortunate as Ahmad Hanafi Rais, Hanum Rais and Baihaqy Rais.
"Everything is still in process. The stage now is only the cadre selection stage at the DPD level. "We will then ask for recommendations to the DPW, then the names will be taken to the PAN DPP to obtain a SK (decree)," Nazaruddin said.
PAN DIY, he said, would not open the registration of regional head candidates from external elements to face the elections in the three DIY districts. "Our policy, if for an area many cadres have been netted or interested in advancing the elections, we focus on that cadre," he said.
Nazarudin said in the elections next year PAN will focus on its own cadres. "So the process can be that the person stated his readiness to move forward, or was proposed by party ranks," he said.
PERSONAL WICAKSONO
